title: Tokyo Day 1 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Yesterday was officially my first day in Tokyo in terms I could try to visit some places. According to the plan I did with my the help of Visit a City I went to Sensoji Temple and Asakusa Shrine both ancient buildings with a lot of culture and history Behind.

After that I tried to visit the Tokyo National Museum, but, was closed and almost all museum in Japan on Mondays. So, I continue walking in Uedo Park

The day was cool and raining all days and sometimes windy, so winter resists to go out in Tokyo.

I did a change of my planes and walked towards Akihabara a famous place for Anime and Manga shops.

Before to go to do shopping I took a lunch, and I got the best Ramen I tried in my life.

With my stomach full I bought some animes for my son and daughter.

As second change in my schedule, I decided to go to Tokyo Government Office which have two observation desk with free access. What I have to say is it was good, but the weather the view wasnâ€™t good, I will try to return tomorrow.

To finish my day, I attend the Drupal Cafe #43 in Tokio to talk about Drupal Console project as you can imagine; The assistance was better that I was expending about 20+.
